definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

sentences.english: If you go to Aberdeen on Hong Kong Island, you will see Ocean Park.
sentences.chinese: 如果你到港島香港仔，你會看到海洋公園。

sentences.english: This area is most suitable for growing wheat.
sentences.chinese: 現在去那兩個溫泉公園玩是最適宜了。

sentences.english: It was taken in Bromo National park.
sentences.chinese: 它拍攝於婆羅摩國家公園。

sentences.english: Take a walk through the park on Zhongshan Road.
Remember to spend a day in Central Park watching a play by Shakespeare in the open air.
sentences.chinese: 記得花一天時間在中央公園露天看莎士比亞的戲劇。

sentences.english: People poured into the Beijing International Sculpture Park.
sentences.chinese: 人們湧進了北京國際雕塑公園。

sentences.english: Chinese elderly exercise at a public park in Beijing. (March 1, 2011) (Vincent Thian/Associated Press)
sentences.chinese: 北京，老年人在公園鍛鍊。

sentences.english: It' near Guzhen Park and about 300 meters away from my shop.
sentences.chinese: 門市接近古鎮公園，離我門市大年夜約300米距離。

sentences.english: Photo taken at Buddha Park, also known as Wat Xieng Khuan 25 km southeast from Vientiane.
sentences.chinese: 在佛公園攝，也寺昆萬象25公里東南衆所周知的。

sentences.english: To prevent avalanches , Park Rangers and Ski Slope managers do what?
sentences.chinese: 爲了防止雪崩，公園看守者們和滑雪場經理們做什麼？

sentences.english: Dogs are not allowed to bring into parks, for they may destroy the flowers in it.
sentences.chinese: 由於狗可能會破壞花木，所以不允許把狗帶進公園。

sentences.english: The trees in the park are all leaving out now.
sentences.chinese: 現在公園裏的樹都長出葉子了。

sentences.english: Dall's sheep and mountain goats are found in the park's alpine environment.
sentences.chinese: 公園的山區還有大角羊和山羊出沒。

sentences.english: This day, John sees a drama again, call 《park street murder case 》.
sentences.chinese: 這天，約翰又去看一齣戲，叫《公園街謀殺案》。

sentences.english: Phillips Park was bordered by Pelee Boulevard and Elmhurst.
sentences.chinese: 菲力浦公園的兩邊是比利大道及艾爾姆霍斯特大街。

definition: land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
